tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE film (film_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  release_date DATE,
  genre VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE dvd (dvd_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  film_id INT REFERENCES film(film_id),
  serial_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  condition VARCHAR(20));

CREATE TABLE trigger_definition (trigger_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trigger_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  trigger_action VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  trigger_condition VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);
